headline.main: SCHOOLS TO POINT TO DICTATOR PERIL; Revised Course of Study of Modern History to Stress Our Democratic Ideals

lead_paragraph: A revised course of study in modern history designed to emphasize the democratic principles of this country and point to the threat of totalitarian regimes has been proposed for the New York City school system by the Board of Superintendents.
abstract: N Y C Supts Bd proposes revised modern history study course
snippet: A revised course of study in modern history designed to emphasize the democratic principles of this country and point to the threat of totalitarian regimes has been proposed for the New York City school system by the Board of Superintendents....
